Text: Only 1 comment since December 2010? Com'on guys "aoloffline" deserves a "thumbs up" on this one. I burnt this to a DVD using "DVD Shrink" (took 15 minutes to convert & burn) and on my Hi Def (1280v720) Plasma it looks brilliant. 6.28Gig of hard drive space and longer to download is definitely worth it. Don't forget to seed longer as it's a bigger file!
